entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023
